column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////As for dessert
column2: we tried three different kinds since it was our first time here - the cheesecake
column4: and a caramel chocolate eclair. The only one I thought was good was the cheesecake
column7: and flaked apart like snow. The only thing
column9: is that it needed some fresh blueberries paired with the "maraschino" blueberries or something crumbly to offset the entire smooth texture. As for the other two desserts
column10: both seemed like they were sitting out. The chocolate eclair mousse was dense and had that slight gel like texture around the outside
column11: and the strawberry passionfruit dessert fell flat and dry. In fact
column12: the layers separated right when we cut through it.
